changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ACTOR_FILM( actor_id integer NOT NULL, film_id integer NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (actor_id, film_id), CONSTRAINT fk_actor FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) references ACTORS (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_film FOREIGN KEY (film_id) references FILMS (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE );
